item.title: Gallena University Celebrates 100 Years!
item.description: Gallena University celebrates 100 years of academic excellence. Gallena University is a private University which was founded in 1912. The 310-acre campus is located in Gallena, a diverse community in a culturally rich region of Northern California. The University enrolls 3,634 students in twenty-five undergraduate and seven graduate programs with approximately 350 full-time faculty and staff. Gallena University celebrates 100 years of academic excellence.

item.title: Study Abroad Informational Meeting
item.description: All Gallena Friends & Family are welcome to join us on campus for our annual semester abroad discussion. This is a great new way to learn about expanding your international education through hands on experience in a foreign country.
item.author: Richard Smith

item.title: Gallena Football Wins First Scrimmage
item.description: Gallena University's football wins its first scrimmage of the year.
item.author: John Q. Sports
